title: AshrayAmyaham satatam (maNipravALam)
sahitya:
AshrayAmyaham satatam aruL tarum varada rAjanai


anupallavi

  bhUsurAdi sEvitam ambujAsanAdi pUjitam


caraNam    karumukhil vaNNamum karuNai vaDivum karigina manasuna dalacina vADugi
 phir dUr karnE kO (bhava) sadA kAnciyuraiyum karuNArUDhanai
